locations: Edison, New Jersey, USA::(studio) (TV Asia USA Studios)
imdb.plot outline: The Dating show where love is Timeless, Ageless and love is Blind. Each week, one luck bachelorette will get to choose from three eligible bachelors to see if she can find her perfect match. The game is broken up into three rounds. The Click Round, The Flirt Round and The Love Round. For the first two rounds, the bachelorette does not get to actually see the bachelors and must eliminate one, in the final round she eliminates one more only to be faced with a twist of the Percentage Calculator (compatibility meter) which tells her if the numbers agree. She then has the option to change her decision and either pick one of our last two finalists or bring back the first bachelor she eliminated sight unseen. We then check in with the couple on next week's episode.
imdb.title: Click Flirt Love
plot: The Dating show where love is Timeless, Ageless and love is Blind. Each week, one luck bachelorette will get to choose from three eligible bachelors to see if she can find her perfect match. The game is broken up into three rounds. The Click Round, The Flirt Round and The Love Round. For the first two rounds, the bachelorette does not get to actually see the bachelors and must eliminate one, in the final round she eliminates one more only to be faced with a twist of the Percentage Calculator (compatibility meter) which tells her if the numbers agree. She then has the option to change her decision and either pick one of our last two finalists or bring back the first bachelor she eliminated sight unseen. We then check in with the couple on next week's episode.::Frank Licari (Creator/Producer)
